Contradict fact: The claim that Clint Eastwood wrote the essay is contradicted by evidence that the essay has been falsely attributed to various individuals before him.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the attribution of the essay to Clint Eastwood, as there is no social media account associated with him and previous attributions have been proven false.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Clint Eastwood authored the essay without providing substantial evidence or verifying its authenticity.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the essay has been falsely attributed to Clint Eastwood, as it has been attributed to other individuals in the past.
